name: Fallen
description: Story of a Father who is in search of his son who has fallen in a cave. You play as Father and fight with monsters,ghosts and deadly animals to save your son. This game has also local multiplayer which can be played upto four players.
minimum_requirements: OS: Win 7 or later Processor: Dual core processor with 2.8 GHz Memory: 2 GB RAM DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 400 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card
recommended_requirements: OS: Win 7 or later Processor: Intel Core i3 Memory: 4 GB RAM DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 400 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card
